item.title: EPFL carbon team
item.description: The EPFL carbon team is a student team from EPFL whose primary goal is to build a Direct Air Capture Machine (DAC)

item.title: Haptic Interface for Restoring Sensation After Nerve Damage
item.description: Damage to the sciatic nerve from surgery or an accident can cause loss of foot sensation, leading to walking difficulties and frequent tripping. My team and I aim to solve this by recreating foot sensation on the patient’s forearm.

item.title: Laboratory assistant work at the Reconfigurable Robotics Lab
item.description: I was hired at the Reconfigurable Robotics Lab to support PhD candidate Mustafa Mete’s research, focusing on the manufacturing and testing of origami robots, along with the design and assembly of printed circuit boards.

item.title: Pneumagami: A Pneumatically Actuated Origami-Inspired Robotic Arm
